recipe.title: Rob Roy
ingredients: 1 1/2 ounces (1 jigger) sweet or dry vermouth
instructions: In a small cocktail pitcher combine the Scotch, the vermouth, the bitters, and 1 cup ice cubes, stir the mixture well, and strain it into a stemmed cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.
